      • makeCommand

        String makeCommand(String filepath,
                   String outputFormat)
        Makes the command to enter into PMD CLI. Command should be comma-deliminated to ensure compatibility with windows paths
        Parameters:
        filepath - path to the file to be evaluated
        outputFormat - format for PMD to return as. See PMD documentation for options
        Returns:
        comma delimited PMD command
